page.title: 12HOWE BRIDGE
page.content:
{HOWE BRIDGE}IS A LARGE MODERN{SPORTS {COMPLEX}CONSISTING OF{SWIMMING FACILITIES,{LARGE INDOOR GYM,}WEIGHT TRAINING,{SQUASH COURTS}AND MUCH MORE BESIDES. THERE IS ALSO RECREATION FACILITIES. ON THE SECOND OF TWO FLOORS THERE IS A{CAFE, A BAR, {CONFERENCE ROOM, DANCE/BALLROOM}AND SPECTATOR FACILITIES.
THERE IS ALSO{OUTDOOR AMENITIES}FOR 5 A SIDE FOOTBALL, TENNIS COURTS AND ATHERTON'S CRICKET GROUNS,{HIGHAM {PARK. }IT HAS A{LARGE CAR PARK}AND IS SURROUNDED BY LARGE PLAYING FIELDS. ALL TYPES OF SPORTS ARE CATERED FOR, INCLUDING{ROCK CLIMBING}AND{TABLE {TENNIS.
